name: Abduction (XXpoomaanXX)
description:
Hello, Gloopian XÆA-12. You have been assigned a mission to capture as many humans as you can so we can test our
latest Energy Drink on them. We have attached a new state-of-the-art
capture ray to your ship,
The Abductinator-5000.
Be warned, it's still a prototype, so it needs some recharge time before it can be fired again so, use it wisely. Captain wants the humans A.S.A.P. so, you must capture as many Humans as you can
in 2 minutes.
 We are counting on you Soldier. Dismissed.

Controls:
WASD or Arrow Keys to move
Space or Mouse Left Click to use Abductonator-5000

Game made for Trijam #73
Theme: Tiny People

Time Taken (According to my timer)
Sprites: 1 hour 3 minutes (first time trying 1-bit artstyle)
Programming: 1 Hour 37 minutes
Bug Fixing: 23 minutes

Total Time: 3 hours 3 Minutes (eh, close enough)

Sprites made by me
Audio taken from freesound.org
